Hello,
My name is Yi-Wen Lin (Wen). I am a freelance creative coder based in London. After living in western culture for all these years, I am still attached to the eastern culture and get even more inspired by it now. Not only working with eastern culture element, I am trying to combine different culture elements that I get from all these years living in foreign countries.

If there anything I can help with your project, feel free to contact me at here.
